content.raw: Oh and the reason why Val explodes is that in the end, it won't be possible to skip directly to this checkpoint (which is 2/2). For now, this is working as 2/1 because pull request #44 hasn't been merged yet. If you feel more comfortable, we can merge that one first. But beware that once that is done, it will be tricky to test this one… That didn't make any sense, did it?
